statements: DELETE FROM irrigation_needs WHERE soil_type = 'clay' AND moisture_reading < 50.5;
DELETE FROM irrigation_needs WHERE soil_type = 'clay' AND moisture_reading < 30;
DELETE FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Garden' AND moisture_level > 50;
DELETE FROM Moisture_Readings WHERE reading_time < '2022-01-01' AND moisture_level > 50;
DELETE FROM Irrigation_Schedule WHERE zone_id = (SELECT zone_id FROM Irrigation_Zones WHERE zone_name = 'Zone A');
DELETE FROM IrrigationSettings WHERE irrigation_zone = 'Zone B' AND threshold_moisture < 0.5;
